item.title: How to create a Standalone Executable in Python
item.description: For Windows # step 1 : check the terminal is in venv if not use cmd set-executionpolicy remotesigned -scope currentuser step 2 : install pyinstaller step 3 : then use cmd pyinstaller --onefile --windowed --clean file_name.py For Mac # use platypus third platypus software For Linux # similar to windows if error of package install according to your distribution
